wf_workflow_version.description: Basic workflow for assigning work on a loaner laptop
wf_workflow_version.name: Loaner Laptop
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Basic workflow for assigning work on a loaner laptop
wf_workflow.name: Loaner Laptop

sys_variable_value.value: 1. Ensure the machine is in good working order. 2. Inventory and test accessories. 3. Re-image the machine
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
1. Ensure the machine is in good working order. 2. Inventory accessories. 3. Load requested software.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
